AssertinFixture.Definition: A test suite contains an assertion statement in its @pytest.fixture or setUp() method.
AssertinFixture.Steps: 1. Understand the purpose of the assertion: For each assertion in the fixture or setUp() method, understand why it is there. 2. Move the assertion to the test method: Create a new test method named test_setup and move the assertion to this method. 3. Remove the assertion:Remove the assertion in the fixture or setUp() method.
